ListPreference.android:summary: A list of available plex media servers on the network. A prefered server takes priority.
ListPreference.android:title: Discovered Servers.

EditTextPreference.android:summary: The domain name or IP Address for your main plex media server. This takes preference over any Discovered Servers selected.
EditTextPreference.android:title: Preferred Server Address

EditTextPreference.android:summary: The port number for the server (usually 32400).
EditTextPreference.android:title: Server Port

ListPreference.android:title: Select the starting category filter.
ListPreference.android:summary: Categories are used to select the starting filter when browsing movies and tv shows. The default is All.

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Experimental Plex Music Library Support. This provides very basic playback support for music libraries and is still under development.
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Enable Plex Music Library Support

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Poster grid layout for music. Only takes affect if music library support is enabled.
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Music Grid Poster Layout

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Prefer Poster Layout for Series (TV Shows).
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Series Poster Layout
Force MX Player Resume Position.
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Forces MX Player to use Plex last played position instead of it's own. This will always forces play back to start from Plex's recorded position.
Prefer plex media server's aspect ratio.
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Plex Aspect Ratio
